title Timeline de Pago (Education_LMS_Portal)
T0ms : Usuario submit pago form

T25ms : 12ms wallet balance check (Education_ContentCDN)

T60ms : Usuario ve: Transaction ID + éxito
: (Education_ClassroomService)
T150ms : Fraud service recibe evento
: 30ms historical data query (Education_GradeSync)
: 40ms ML inference (Education_GradeSync)
: 20ms DynamoDB writes
: Total: ~90ms
T250ms : Payment service enqueue a SQS
: (Education_GradeSync)
T400ms : Bank responds + ePayco confirms
: 100ms network time
: 100ms bank processing
: 50ms response + parse
: Total: ~250ms
T420ms : Transaction update + publish
: 5ms transaction update
: 10ms idempotency store
: 5ms SNS publish
T500ms : Notifications sent (Education_ContentCDN)
: Email enqueued
: SMS enqueued
T1000ms : User checks app
: Sees "Confirmed"
